effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

short_effect.sun-moon: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.
